title: 'We want another homeless hotel - and we can make it work'
description: The Holiday Inn in Gorton, Manchester, housed homeless people throughout the pandemic, until the end of May.

title: WhatsApp launches privacy campaign after backlash
description: The head of WhatsApp says governments should "demand more security" as encryption comes under fire.

title: Euro 2020: All the goals in 60 seconds as Netherlands beat Ukraine five-goal thriller
description: Watch all the goals from a cracking game in Amsterdam as Ukraine recover from 2-0 down to make it 20-2 before a late Denzel Dumfries winner seals a 3-2 win for the Netherlands.

title: Tech firms use remote monitoring to help honey bees
description: From Ireland to Israel, companies are coming to the aid of the environmentally critical insect.

title: Euro 2020: Five-goal Netherlands thriller an uplifting end to traumatic weekend
description: After a harrowing 36 hours for European football following Christian Eriksen's collapse, the Netherland and Ukraine served up a Euro 2020 classic.

title: Ethiopian migrants face robbery, extortion and starvation
description: Every year thousands of migrants risk it all on the perilous journey from Ethiopia to Saudi Arabia.

title: ‘Really, really rare’ seahorse spotted off UK coast
description: A marine biologist says it’s the first time he’s ever seen a long-snouted seahorse in the wild.

title: ASMR: Former farmer, 84, is accidental YouTube star
description: John Butler's videos have been watched by millions after he became popular with the ASMR community.

title: The buzzwords reflecting the frustration of China's young generation
description: Millions in China are expressing their desire to break free of a standard definition of success.

title: Jess Phillips: Ditch HPV stigma to avoid the shame I felt
description: With more women being told they have the virus, Jess Phillips says there needs to be more discussion.

title: Euro 2020: The ways Scotland has changed since France '98
description: When Scotland's men last played in a major football tournament, there was no Scottish Parliament and Google didn't exist.

title: E3 2021: Microsoft shows off Halo Infinite, Starfield and Forza Horizon 5
description: A release date for Halo, a new Forza racer, and the unveil of Starfield were all at Microsoft's E3.

title: Netanyahu: A shrewd leader who reshaped Israel
description: Loved and loathed, Israel's ousted long-term PM made his mark on the country at home and abroad.

title: England 1-0 Croatia: 'Southgate got big calls exactly right'
description: England boss Gareth Southgate's opening team selection of Euro 2020 offered up plenty of debating points - but he got it right, says Phil McNulty.

title: Euro 2020 England 1-0 Croatia: Raheem Sterling was brightest spark - Rio Ferdinand
description: BBC Sport pundit Rio Ferdinand says Raheem Sterling "was the brightest spark" in England's opening game against Croatia.

title: In pictures: World leaders bask in Cornwall sun at G7 summit
description: World leaders are by the seaside for three days of talks - and the occasional trip to the beach...

description: G7 leaders make new pledges to combat climate change, but campaigners say they lack detail.

title: Euro 2020: Excitement builds as England face Croatia in opening game

description: Israel's long-term leader is set to be unseated by a coalition of parties which united against him.

title: G7 summit: Dominic Raab says EU's attitude to Northern Ireland 'offensive'
description: The foreign secretary says the EU characterises Northern Ireland "as somehow a separate country".

title: G7 to agree tough measures on burning coal to tackle climate change
description: It comes as Sir David Attenborough warns humans may be about to destabilise the entire planet.

title: 'Absolutely ridiculous' - Peter Schmeichel criticises decision to restart Denmark v Finland game
description: Peter Schmeichel criticises Uefa's decision to restart the game between Denmark and Finland after Christian Eriksen's collapse

description: Christian Eriksen remains stable in hospital and has sent his greetings to his national team-mates, say Danish football officials.

description: Dominic Raab says the decision depends on breaking the link between cases and hospital admissions.

description: Nanw Beard said challenging the man's "disgusting" behaviour had made her feel "empowered".

title: 'I miss airline meals so much I make them at home'

title: Covid in Scotland: Over-40s urged to get second vaccine sooner
description: People in older age groups waiting for a second dose should seek appointments after eight weeks.
